body.name: Amazon Elements Vitamin C 1000mg, Supports Healthy Immune System, Vegan, 300 Tablets, 10 month supply

Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 5 hrs 5 mins
features: ONE BOTTLE CONTAINS: 300 tablets, a 10 month supply (taken daily at listed serving size); 1000mg Vitamin C (as ascorbic acid) per serving
IMMUNE SUPPORT: Supports a healthy immune system
NO ARTIFICIAL: Colors, flavors, or chemical preservatives; vegan; gluten free
BLENDED AND PACKAGED IN USA: Made in a Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP) facility in the USA; product of China
PRODUCT NOTE: Exposure to heat or sunlight may lead to melting/damage of product; Amazon stores and ships products in accordance with manufacturers recommendations when provided
body.description: Supports Healthy Immune System*Our Vitamin C supplement is the product of the fermentation of the sugar alcohol sorbitol and corn steep liquor (a concentrate of amino acids, vitamins, and minerals).Amazon Elements thoroughly tests every batch of product for quality and safety--see below for detailed information about ingredient origins.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars “Amazon Elements Vitamin C: A Potent Immunity Booster!”
reviews.reviewText: Taste: ★★★★☆I’ve tried various vitamin C supplements, and I must say, Amazon Elements’ Vitamin C is one of the more palatable options out there. It has a mild, slightly citrusy flavor that doesn’t leave a bitter aftertaste like some other brands. Mixing it with water or juice is a breeze, making it an enjoyable part of my daily routine.Performance: ★★★★★This Vitamin C supplement means business. At 1000mg per serving, it packs a powerful punch. I’ve noticed a significant improvement in my immunity and overall health since incorporating it into my daily regimen. I’ve been able to ward off colds and flu more effectively, and my skin has a healthy glow to it. Amazon Elements really delivers on its promise of high-quality performance.Ease of Swallowing: ★★★★★The capsules are easy to swallow, even for someone like me who sometimes struggles with larger pills. The size is just right, and they go down smoothly without any discomfort. No need to break them apart or fuss with tricky swallowing techniques.Quality: ★★★★★Amazon Elements takes quality seriously, and it shows in their Vitamin C product. It’s made with high-grade ingredients, and the manufacturing process is rigorous, ensuring that you’re getting a top-notch supplement. Plus, the transparent labeling and sourcing information instill confidence in its quality and purity.Overall, Amazon Elements 1000mg Vitamin C is an excellent choice for those looking to boost their immune system and overall well-being. It tastes good, performs even better, goes down easily, and comes from a brand you can trust. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Secret Weapon to Stay Healthy!
reviews.reviewText: Are you looking to boost your immune system and stay healthy? Look no further than Amazon Elements Vitamin C 1000mg! This supplement is packed with immune-boosting vitamin C, perfect for keeping you healthy during cold and flu season.With 300 tablets in each bottle, you'll have a 10-month supply of this essential vitamin. And the best part? These tablets are vegan, so they're perfect for anyone following a plant-based lifestyle.One of the things I really appreciate about this product is the quality. Amazon Elements is known for using high-quality ingredients in their supplements, and this Vitamin C is no exception. You can trust that you're getting a safe and effective product that will support your immune system.In terms of taste, these tablets are easy to swallow and don't have any strange aftertaste. And with the convenience of taking just one tablet per day, it's an easy addition to your daily routine.As for cons, the only thing I would note is that the tablets are quite large, so if you have trouble swallowing pills, you may want to consider a different form of Vitamin C supplement.Overall, if you're looking for a high-quality, vegan Vitamin C supplement to support your immune system, I highly recommend giving Amazon Elements Vitamin C 1000mg a try.
